name: FIN_ASST_TRKR_FLAG
description: Generic flags to aid in finding trackers to followup or report on.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_TRACKER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the program tracker record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_TRACKER_FLAG_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores flags describing why the tracker is in a certain status, needs a some kind of followup, or is reported in a specific way.
